attributes.action: Allow the 1st of August 2007 to be a Bank Holiday so that all members or fomer members of the Scout Organisation can renew there promise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As this is the Scoutings Centenary year (2007) We would like to have 1st August off work to renew our promise at sunrise and to join in with the other scouting activities.  This is a World event and as Mrs Blair was a former Girl Guide I am sure she would be renewing her promise.
